class.name: hector_quadrotor_controller/PoseController
class.description: The PoseController controls the quadrotor's pose and outputs velocity commands.

class.name: hector_quadrotor_controller/TwistController
class.description: The TwistController controls the quadrotor's twist (linear and angular velocity) by applying torque and thrust similar to a real quadrotor.

class.name: hector_quadrotor_controller/MotorController
class.description: The MotorController calculates the output voltages of the four motors from the commanded thrust and torque using a simple linearized model.
